com.aryjr.nheengatu.html

Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aryjr.nheengatu.html.Tag

  • public class Tag
extends Object
    Represents a basic HTML tag.

    See more at: http://www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-html40-19980424/index/elements.html
    Version:
    $Id: Tag.java,v 1.1 2007/12/26 15:57:42 tah Exp $
    Author:
    Ary Junior
